alert.note: Alert for Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 26 at 3:57PM EDT until August 26 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL YORK AND NORTHEASTERN STRAFFORD COUNTIES... At 357 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lebanon, or 8 miles west of Sanford, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rochester, Sanford, Berwick, Lebanon, Acton, Milton, Shapleigh and North Berwick. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
